scenes.description: Takanashi Kiara performs her original song "The Great Wanderer".
Takanashi Kiara talks to the audience about her performance, her album "Point of View", and an upcoming members-only stream.

subtitles.original: That was TGW, "The Great Wanderer"!
subtitles.english: That was TGW, "The Great Wanderer"!

subtitles.original: You were all waiting for that one, weren't you? Me too, me too!
subtitles.english: You were all waiting for that one, weren't you? Me too, me too!

subtitles.original: Ah, I feel like the vibe was definitely there. Did you feel it? Ah...
subtitles.english: Ah, I feel like the vibe was definitely there. Did you feel it? Ah...

subtitles.original: "The Great Wanderer" on my album, Point of View right now! So if you want to hear more of that...
subtitles.english: "The Great Wanderer" on my album, Point of View right now! So if you want to hear more of that...

subtitles.original: If that was the first time you heard it, then what are you doing?
subtitles.english: If that was the first time you heard it, then what are you doing?

subtitles.original: Go listen to my album, please!
subtitles.english: Go listen to my album, please!

subtitles.original: Yeah, I really like the choreo, so I hope I can dance to it again sometime soon.
subtitles.english: Yeah, I really like the choreo, so I hope I can dance to it again sometime soon.

subtitles.original: And actually, I don't know if you know it yet...
subtitles.english: And actually, I don't know if you know it yet...

subtitles.original: But right after this—because this is, you know, as you can see, already ending soon...
subtitles.english: But right after this—because this is, you know, as you can see, already ending soon...

subtitles.original: もうすぐ終わるんですけど...
subtitles.english: It's ending soon, but...

subtitles.original: 実はこのあとメン限あります！
subtitles.english: Actually, there's a members-only part after this!

subtitles.original: There is a members-only part following right after this!
subtitles.english: There is a members-only part following right after this!

subtitles.original: So please check it out. It's the first time I get to do something like that.
subtitles.english: So please check it out. It's the first time I get to do something like that.

subtitles.original: So it's really exciting for me.
subtitles.english: So it's really exciting for me.

subtitles.original: My members, I hope you will enjoy what I have prepared for you.
subtitles.english: My members, I hope you will enjoy what I have prepared for you.

subtitles.original: Just a little bit, you know, just a little bit extra.
subtitles.english: Just a little bit, you know, just a little bit extra.

subtitles.original: Yeah, and besides that, of course, I just mentioned I want to, you know, talk about my album...
subtitles.english: Yeah, and besides that, of course, I just mentioned I want to, you know, talk about my album...

subtitles.original: Because originally I wanted to do this live during the time when the album was released...
subtitles.english: Because originally I wanted to do this live during the time when the album was released...

subtitles.original: But didn't quite work out. So let me say it now, guys!
subtitles.english: But didn't quite work out. So let me say it now, guys!

subtitles.original: 私のアルバムから、いくつもね、今日、新曲を披露させていただきましたけども、
subtitles.english: I performed several new songs from my album today, but...

subtitles.original: 聴いてますか？
subtitles.english: Are you listening to them?

subtitles.original: Point of View on Spotify, on Amazon Music, on Apple Music...
subtitles.english: Point of View on Spotify, on Amazon Music, on Apple Music...

subtitles.original: Everywhere! Please listen to Point of View!
subtitles.english: Everywhere! Please listen to Point of View!

subtitles.original: Hi! And, yeah, besides that...
subtitles.english: Hi! And, yeah, besides that...

subtitles.original: Thank you guys so much for waiting for this.
subtitles.english: Thank you guys so much for waiting for this.

subtitles.original: I'm so happy that today is finally the day that I can show off some of my new songs...
subtitles.english: I'm so happy that today is finally the day that I can show off some of my new songs...

subtitles.original: ...some of my old songs and have some great guests over.
subtitles.english: ...some of my old songs and have some great guests over.

subtitles.original: Yeah, did you enjoy everything?
subtitles.english: Yeah, did you enjoy everything?

subtitles.original: What was your favorite performance? What was your favorite guest? Hm? Hm? Hm?
subtitles.english: What was your favorite performance? What was your favorite guest? Hm? Hm? Hm?

subtitles.original: Me too! Oh, what a coincidence!
subtitles.english: Me too! Oh, what a coincidence!

subtitles.original: Mm, yes. Uh, well, besides this...
subtitles.english: Mm, yes. Uh, well, besides this...

subtitles.original: This stream is End Of The Year Concert...
subtitles.english: This stream is End Of The Year Concert...

subtitles.original: ...so I want to say...
subtitles.english: ...so I want to say...
